description: Sometimes, it's just all about the girls. And Hilary Swank proved that true when she attended the New York Knicks game with her boyfriend Ruben and fellow actress Mariska Hargitay.
title: Hilary Swank and Ruben Torres take in New York Knicks game with Mariska Hargitay
title_page: Hilary Swank and Ruben Torres take in New York Knicks game with Mariska Hargitay | Daily Mail Online
text:
Hilary Swank was showered with love on Sunday evening.
While taking in a New York Knicks game, the 41-year-old actress was kissed by her boyfriend Ruben Torres.
Awkwardly, next to them was Law & Order: SVU vet Mariska Hargitay, 51, who was with her son August Herman, aged nine. And, oddly, the two stars were wearing identical T-shirts.
